nodes.text: Heroes of the Rebellion Collectors' Set

Heroes of the Rebellion Colectors' Set is a set of 25mm metal miniatures produced by Grenadier Models in 1988 for use with West End Games's Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game and Stars Wars Miniatures Battles.

It is a period of civil war. A small group of Rebels battle an evil Galactic Empire, hoping to restore freedom to the galaxy. Led by Luke Skywalker, Princess Leia, Han Solo, and other heroes of the Battle of Yavin, the Rebels face overwhelming odds, hard choices, impossible challenges — but they know they can triumph, for the Force is with them always!

Experience the vast scope and sweeping power of the Star Wars movie saga with the Heroes of the Rebellion Collectors' Set. This 10-figure set includes the heroes of Star Wars: A New Hope, as well as character statistics of every figure for use with Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game.
